What is iQmetrix Platform?
iQmetrix Platform is built from the ground up to support omnichannel retail experiences. Our developmental philosophy considers the operational complexity retailers face every day. Whether handling in-store, e-commerce or mobile transactions, we want to provide seamless experiences to retail staff and customers.

All our Platform services are designed with a publicly-facing REST API as a first-class citizen. This is the same API that our own developers use to build various products. API Documentation Learn more about Platform
RQ Retail Management is a modular system for managing all aspects of a store chain operation, including POS, ERP, inventory and HR. Learn More
XQ Interactive Retail brings elements of online and mobile shopping experiences into the physical store to engage and educate shoppers during the purchase process. Learn More
Feedback We are passionate about creating a great developer experience for you so please don't hesitate to contact us with any feedback related to API design, usability or new features that you are interested in. Support Can't find what you are looking for or have any questions about our API? Please contact our API support team and we will get back to you as fast as we possibly can. We're Hiring! Interested in working at iQmetrix? Don’t be shy. Check out our job openings, read our 'What's New in the Q' blog, and count down our 'Top 10 Reasons' to join our team. About iQmetrix Learn more about our company and our culture. iQmetrix specializes in end-to-end retail solutions. Read about the origins of our company and our exciting plans for the future.
